name: Equanimous-meow
body:
### Welcome to Equanimous Meow
This repo contains utilities for use with Slack.

### slackarchive.py
Performs archival exports of Slack channels, as well as parsing exported history files to stitch together a continuous narrative labeled with user names in addition to ID strings.

### slack_mefi.css
Slack doesn't support themes, but with the [Stylish browser extension](https://userstyles.org/stylish), this CSS file will theme the entire Slack web interface in a blue/green motif inspired by www.metafilter.com. Additional dialogs/pages are being added to the theme on an ongoing basis.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
